name: InfecundNotForContraceptiveReasonsHCPCSProcedures
title: Infecund Not for Contraceptive Reasons HCPCS Procedures
description: For Contraceptive eCQMs Approval for Trial Use application in Spring 2022; This set of values contains codes indicating infecundity for non-contraceptive reasons (e.g., hysterectomy, bilateral oophorectomy, etc).
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family Planning - provision of most and moderately effective contraceptive methods, access to long-acting reversible contraception (LARC)),(Data Element Scope: Procedure codes indicating infecundity for non-contraceptive reasons (e.g, hysterectomy, bilateral oophorectomy)),(Inclusion Criteria: Procedure codes indicating infecundity for non-contraceptive reasons (e.g, hysterectomy, bilateral oophorectomy)),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes female sterilization procedures for contraception (e.g., bilateral tubal ligation, bilateral salpingectomy))

concept.display: Patients who have had a hysterectomy
